title: Philippine's Rice and Corn Crop Yield Report from 2010-2022
description: This is a project made to learn utilizing Looker Studio as well as understand the trends and patterns in production of important crops in the Philippines.

title: Gold Price Prediction using Regression Algorithms
description: Comparing 4 regression models to determine whether macroeconomic or technical indicator is more accuracy in detecting gold price.

title: Rice Disease Detection using Few-Shot Learning
description: This is a undergraduate thesis project which utilize few-shot learning approach in classifying rice diseases in the Philippines
